title: Pixel 2 XL stuck on boot G logo screen after May 2020 security update installed and restart.
content:
Today I installed the May 2020 security update on my Pixel 2 XL but after installing on reboot the phone is stuck on boot screen where G logo is shown.

The device was working totally fine before that and immediately after update installation it asked for restart which I did and since then the device is stucked on G logo boot screen

Please help. I don't want to factory reset.
